=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/10/16 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Joss Whedon', 'James A. Contner', 'David Solomon', 'David Grossman', 'Michael Gershman', 'Bruce Seth Green', 'Nick Marck', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'David Greenwalt', 'David Semel'], 'Starring': ['Sarah Michelle Gellar', 'Nicholas Brendon', 'Alyson Hannigan'], 'Studio': ['FOX']} Review Text: I started watching this series recently because I liked other work by Joss Whedon and because this show seems to be on so many "Best of" lists. I found that it is very enjoyable. Mostly interesting characters, and good storylines, considering the subject. I finish each episode wanting to see more, so I guess that is why it was as on TV for so long.
I recommend it if you are looking for something to watch, but you can expect to get hooked. Review Title: I started watching this series recently because I liked other work by Joss Whedon and because this show ... Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Boston's Finest Unscripted, Drama ["Centering on the men and women of the Boston Police Department, Boston's Finest will offer viewers an up-close and very personal look at what it takes to protect and serve Boston. In addition to following the officers while they are on duty, Boston's Finest will provide a glimpse into their personal lives when they are off the clock."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Eric S. Smith'], 'Producers': ['Natalia Baldwin León', 'Julie Insogna', 'Seth Jarrett', 'Jennifer L. Rettig', 'Erin Shockey', 'Rick Van Meter', 'Donnie Wahlberg', 'Robert Wahlberg', 'Tim Davis']} I like that this show has some persoanl drama, but it not over the top.
Looking forward to n ext season. I saw a couple of episodes via Amazon, on my HDX 8.9 and the picture and sound were very good.
I would recommend this show. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy unscripted drama series portraying personal and professional lives, particularly in law enforcement, alongside a strong appreciation for action-comedy films. They are particularly drawn to modern adaptations of classic narratives that blend drama and humor while avoiding excessive sensationalism. Their recent interaction indicates an enjoyment of series with interesting characters and engaging storylines, reinforcing their desire for well-crafted content that balances entertainment with depth.

- **Engagement Style:** Their engagement remains active and loyal, reflecting a critical approach to storytelling. The user emphasizes a preference for nuanced narratives and consistently seeks out series that are both compelling and relatable, as evidenced by their recent positive review. 

- **Rating Behavior:** Consistently rating content highly, the user has maintained a discerning approach, with recent ratings averaging 4.0. Their feedback includes constructive insights, highlighting their appreciation for entertaining yet coherent narratives.

- **Viewing Context:** They prefer English-language audio with closed captioning for enhanced accessibility and comprehension.

Overall, the user values authentic storytelling, seeking diverse narratives that balance depth and entertainment. Their pursuit of well-crafted series and films underscores their established taste for innovative content with strong narrative structures, further evident in their admiration for character-driven stories.
